overview: "After dating hundreds of musicians, I've come to the conclusion that rockers play music the same way that they fuck. Some like to play hard and fast and some slow and soft. What kind of rocker are you?" Young poetess Madison divulges her steamy sexual experiences with hot rock stars. Lots of hot boy/girl and girl/girl sex set to a killer soundtrack that will keep you hard, wet and ready to rock.
title: Writers & Rockstars
